description.text: Even at the start of your career, it was clear that you had a chance at greatness, and your legend continues to grow with every adventure.

sections.Benefit: You gain a hero point. The maximum number of hero points you can have at any one time is increased to 5.
sections.Note: See Hero Points for full details.
sections.Special: NPCs who take this Feat receive 1 hero point and can have up to 3 (not 5).
sections.Normal: You can have no more than 3 hero points at one time.
